channel.title: Projects on Nikola Stoyanov
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Nikola Stoyanov

item.title: Research
item.description: Cohesive models for crack opening using the PPR model. Structural behaviour of cracks in fire. Protection materials for low and high temperatures. Canny edge detection for SEM micrographs. Post-processing for the contour method package pyCM. Inverse heat transfer modeling.
